mapper.select: select @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS rownum, no, notice_type, cnt, title, content, created_id, date_format(created_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d') created_datetime, updated_id, updated_datetime from tb_notice where (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0)=0 and notice_type = 'Y' order by no desc

select @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS rownum, no, notice_type, cnt, title, content, created_id, date_format(created_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d') created_datetime, updated_id, updated_datetime from tb_notice where (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0)=0 and notice_type is null
and (title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') or content like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%'))
and title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
and content like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
order by no desc LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

select count(*) tocnt from tb_notice where 1 = 1 and notice_type is null
and (title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') or content like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%'))
and title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
and content like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')

select sum(a.tocnt) tocnt from ( select count(*) tocnt from tb_notice where notice_type = 'Y' union all select count(*) tocnt from tb_notice where 1 = 1 and notice_type is null
and (title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') or content like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%'))
and title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
and content like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
)a

select a.no, a.notice_type, a.cnt, a.title, a.content, a.created_id, date_format(a.created_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') created_datetime, a.updated_id, a.updated_datetime from tb_notice a where a.no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_notice ( notice_type, title, content, created_id, created_datetime ) values ( #{notice_type}, #{title}, #{content}, #{created_id}, now() )
mapper.update: update tb_notice set notice_type = #{notice_type}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_id = #{updated_id}, updated_datetime = now() where no = #{no}
update tb_notice set cnt = ifnull(cnt, 0)+1 where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS rownum, no, notice_type, cnt, title, content, created_id, date_format(created_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d') created_datetime, updated_id, updated_datetime from tb_data where (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0)=0 and notice_type = 'Y' order by no desc

select @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS rownum, no, notice_type, cnt, title, content, created_id, date_format(created_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d') created_datetime, updated_id, updated_datetime from tb_data where (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0)=0 and notice_type is null
and (title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') or content like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%'))
and title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
and content like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
order by no desc LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

select count(*) tocnt from tb_data where 1 = 1 and notice_type is null
and (title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') or content like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%'))
and title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
and content like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')

select sum(a.tocnt) tocnt from ( select count(*) tocnt from tb_data where notice_type = 'Y' union all select count(*) tocnt from tb_data where 1 = 1 and notice_type is null
and (title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') or content like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%'))
and title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
and content like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
)a

select a.no, a.notice_type, a.cnt, a.title, a.content, a.created_id, date_format(a.created_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') created_datetime, a.updated_id, a.updated_datetime from tb_data a where a.no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_data ( notice_type, title, content, created_id, created_datetime ) values ( #{notice_type}, #{title}, #{content}, #{created_id}, now() )
mapper.update: update tb_data set notice_type = #{notice_type}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_id = #{updated_id}, updated_datetime = now() where no = #{no}
update tb_data set cnt = ifnull(cnt, 0)+1 where no = #{no}

select @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS rownum, no, cnt, title, content, reply, created_id, date_format(created_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d') created_datetime, updated_id, updated_datetime from tb_faq where (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0)=0
and (title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') or content like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%'))
and title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
and content like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
order by no desc LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

select count(*) tocnt from tb_faq where 1 = 1
and (title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') or content like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%'))
and title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
and content like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
select a.no, a.cnt, a.title, a.content, a.reply, a.created_id, date_format(a.created_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') created_datetime, a.updated_id, a.updated_datetime from tb_faq a where a.no = #{no}

mapper.update: update tb_faq set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, reply = #{reply}, updated_id = #{updated_id}, updated_datetime = now() where no = #{no}

mapper.insert:
insert into tb_file ( file_no, file_type, file_check, file_nm, server_file_nm, size, path, server_url ) values
( #{item.file_no}, #{item.file_type}, #{item.file_check}, #{item.file_nm}, #{item.server_file_nm}, #{item.size}, #{item.path}, #{item.server_url} )

insert into tb_file ( file_no, file_type, file_check, file_nm, server_file_nm, size, path, server_url ) values
#{item.file_no}, #{item.file_type}, #{item.file_check}, #{item.file_nm}, #{item.server_file_nm}, #{item.size}, #{item.path}, #{item.server_url}
mapper.select:
select path from tb_file where no in

mapper.delete:

#{item}
mapper.select: select a.no, a.store_id, a.role_id, a.cnt, a.title, a.tel, a.email, a.content, a.reply, b.ceo, date_format(a.created_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d') created_datetime from tb_inquiry a inner join tb_store b on a.store_id = b.store_id where a.no = #{no}
mapper.update: update tb_inquiry set reply = #{reply}, updated_id = #{updated_id}, updated_datetime = now() where no = #{no}
update tb_inquiry set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, tel = #{tel}, email = #{email}, updated_id = #{updated_id}, updated_datetime = now() where no = #{no}
update tb_inquiry set cnt = ifnull(cnt, 0)+1 where no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_inquiry ( store_id, role_id, title, tel, email, content, created_id, created_datetime ) values ( #{store_id}, #{role_id}, #{title}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{content}, #{created_id}, now() )
mapper.select:
select count(*) tocnt from tb_pay_cancel_req a inner join tb_store b on a.store_id = b.store_id where (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0)=0
and a.role_id = #{role_id}
and a.store_id = #{store_id}
and (a.title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') or a.content like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') or b.ceo like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
and a.title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
and a.content like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
and b.ceo like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')

select a.no, a.store_id, a.role_id, a.cnt, a.role_check, a.title, a.tel, a.email, a.content, a.reply, date_format(a.authdate, '%Y.%m.%d') authdate, a.amount, a.orderno, a.username, a.userid, b.ceo, date_format(a.created_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d') created_datetime from tb_pay_cancel_req a inner join tb_store b on a.store_id = b.store_id where a.no = #{no}
mapper.update: update tb_pay_cancel_req set reply = #{reply}, updated_id = #{updated_id}, updated_datetime = now() where no = #{no}

update tb_pay_cancel_req set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, tel = #{tel}, email = #{email}, authdate = #{authdate}, amount = #{amount}, orderno = #{orderno}, username = #{username}, userid = #{userid}, updated_id = #{updated_id}, updated_datetime = now() where no = #{no}
update tb_pay_cancel_req set cnt = ifnull(cnt, 0)+1 where no = #{no}
update tb_pay_cancel_req set role_check = 'Y' where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select count(*) tocnt from tb_pay_cancel_req where role_check = 'N'
mapper.insert: insert into tb_pay_cancel_req ( store_id, role_id, title, tel, email, authdate, amount, orderno, username, userid, content, created_id, created_datetime ) values ( #{store_id}, #{role_id}, #{title}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{authdate}, #{amount}, #{orderno}, #{username}, #{userid}, #{content}, #{created_id}, now() )
